basic_information.scholarship_name: Oklahoma City Chapter of the Association of Government Accountants Scholarship (Graduate)

description: The Oklahoma City Chapter of the Association of Government Accountants Scholarship (Graduate) is open to MBA or MSBA graduate students with a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA. Students must provide a statement outlining career goals. Financial need to be considered. Preference to be given for those applicants interested in a Government career. Eligibility Requirements MBA or MSBA graduate students Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Students must provide a statement outlining career goals Selection Process Financial need to be considered Preference to be given for those applicants interested in a Government career

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
